Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Northbound Reroute near Stetson/Randolph
ShortDescription: NB  #6 Jackson Park Exp buses are rrtd via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, Wacker, then resume their normal route due to street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Northbound  #6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus, Wacker, then resume their normal route (take layover on Wacker between Columbus and Michigan) due to street blockage near Stetson/Randolph.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #52 Kedzie, #52A South Kedzie Temporary Southbound Reroute near Kedzie/Orange Line
ShortDescription: SB 52 Kedzie, 52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 47th, California, 51st and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Kedzie/Orange Line.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #52 Kedzie, #52A South Kedzie buses are temporarily rerouted via Kedzie, 47th, California, 51st and Kedzie: due to, street blockage near Kedzie/Orange Line.

Northbound  buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
